TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @electronic{leferrand2024ntu, author = {Le Ferrand, {'E}ric and Prud'hommeaux, Emily and Hartshorne, Joshua K. and Sung, Li-May}, year = {2024}, title = {{NTU} {Paiwan} {ASR} Corpus},type = {Electronic Resource}}

S.FORM: kasicuayan, nu izua seman tjinukuyan i 'inaljan tua sepaiwan zuku, kipulju a ta'alja'aljan i 'inaljan a mapuljat.
kasicoayan, no izoa seman tjinokoyan i 'inaljan toa sepaiwan zoko, kipoljo a ta'alja'aljan i 'inaljan a mapoljat.
tuazua tjaturuvuanan a 'emau a 'emuma'uma tua ta'alja'aljan, a patje tucu a patje seleman a tjinukuyan, neka nu pukaui a kipusengsengan a sema kavuavuan.
toazoa tjatorovoanan a 'emao a 'emoma'oma toa ta'alja'aljan, a patje toco a patje seleman a tjinokoyan, neka no pokaoi a kiposengsengan a sema kavoavoan.
azua ki makasimulu' a 'adaw, a i 'inaljan neka nu madjadjelidjeli, neka uta nu semenasenay, neka nu paraziuziu, neta uta nu pacucun tua tiribi.
azoa ki makasimolo' a 'adaw, a i 'inaljan neka no madjadjelidjeli, neka ota no semenasenay, neka no paraziozio, neta ota no pacocon toa tiribi.
"aicu a tjapaulan a ta'alja'aljan a mapuljat, saka mama mamamawitjen a tasu kasuvetjevetjekan a kasu'ali'alian," ayaya a venarung a marka ta'alja'aljan,
"aico a tjapaolan a ta'alja'aljan a mapoljat, saka mama mamamawitjen a taso kasovetjevetjekan a kaso'ali'alian," ayaya a venarong a marka ta'alja'aljan,
manasika neka nu selaing a kipuneka a kisu kipuneka puvililjan a kipusau tazua vaivaik a kitjukuda a sikata'aljan.
manasika neka no selaing a kiponeka a kiso kiponeka povililjan a kiposao tazoa vaivaik a kitjokoda a sikata'aljan.
izua za kai i tua seisiu a mayatucu, "kisaseljangu a maleva tua maleva malevaleva a cawcau, kisaseljangu a 'emaung tua 'emau'aung a cawcau," aya
izoa za kai i toa seisio a mayatoco, "kisaseljango a maleva toa maleva malevaleva a cawcao, kisaseljango a 'emaong toa 'emao'aong a cawcao," aya
mavan ka inianan ka kemljang a sepaiwan zuku a cawcau tua patjara cemas, ka inianan ka semupu tua seisiu, izua za izuanga za namayatucu a sivarungan.
mavan ka inianan ka kemljang a sepaiwan zoko a cawcao toa patjara cemas, ka inianan ka semopo toa seisio, izoa za izoanga za namayatoco a sivarongan.
a sinikitulu tua 'emaljup tua sepaiwan zuku a mareka ru'alju'aljup a cawcau ini ka manu sauru sauraman tua sacemel.
a sinikitolo toa 'emaljop toa sepaiwan zoko a mareka ro'aljo'aljop a cawcao ini ka mano saoro saoraman toa sacemel.
a mareka raru'aljupan a cawcau tja tjaljaliavan a 'inaljup niamadju, ljakua palemek tu tjaljakedrikedrian a pinasuangalj nimadju niamadju tua inalap.
a mareka raro'aljopan a cawcao tja tjaljaliavan a 'inaljop niamadjo, ljakoa palemek to tjaljakedrikedrian a pinasoangalj nimadjo niamadjo toa inalap.
kasicuayan, a mareka ru'alju'aljup nu izua inalap a sacemel, tjara vinadisan a pakaleva tua mamazangiljan, 'aw azua zumanga a vutjulj si sisiljevanga a 'emaru'arut tua ta'alja'aljan a pa pipaljing.
kasicoayan, a mareka ro'aljo'aljop no izoa inalap a sacemel, tjara vinadisan a pakaleva toa mamazangiljan, 'aw azoa zomanga a votjolj si sisiljevanga a 'emaro'arot toa ta'alja'aljan a pa pipaljing.

ini ka amin nu izua a ma'ipe'ipel a kinacemkeljan i 'inaljan, azua mareka ru'alju'aljup a cawcau tjara sangasangas tjara sangasangasan sakamaya a sematjez tiamadju tazua sacemel a seman sinisupulju sinisupuljui sinisupulju.

ini ka amin no izoa a ma'ipe'ipel a kinacemkeljan i 'inaljan, azoa mareka ro'aljo'aljop a cawcao tjara sangasangas tjara sangasangasan sakamaya a sematjez tiamadjo tazoa sacemel a seman sinisopoljo sinisopoljoi sinisopoljo.
a palalaut, a ru'alju'aljup a cawcau, amin a 'edril, a aljis, katua te'ung nua sacemel a adju'en nu namasan nimadju, kedri a sikipu'arutan tua kanen.
a palalaot, a ro'aljo'aljop a cawcao, amin a 'edril, a aljis, katoa te'ong noa sacemel a adjo'en no namasan nimadjo, kedri a sikipo'arotan toa kanen.
ljakua a puzangalan nua varung niamadju napaka napakatjezua aravac, ayatua a namasan tjaljakudralan tua kakavelian tjaymadju, mavan a neka nu namaulj i 'inaljan tua siljeva nimadju.
ljakoa a pozangalan noa varong niamadjo napaka napakatjezoa aravac, ayatoa a namasan tjaljakodralan toa kakavelian tjaymadjo, mavan a neka no namaolj i 'inaljan toa siljeva nimadjo.
azua ini ka kemeljang tu semiljeva tua puzangalan a cawcau, pazangal aravac a mi malingdjelj i tua kinateveteveljan nua sepaiwan zuku.
azoa ini ka kemeljang to semiljeva toa pozangalan a cawcao, pazangal aravac a mi malingdjelj i toa kinateveteveljan noa sepaiwan zoko.
"inikatjen a venudilj tua tjakinamangua', azua na naseman tjaparavac tua sala salasaladj mavan a nasancawcau." aicu a tulu, ini ka ini ka kaulavan angata a sepaiwan zuku a cawcau.
"inikatjen a venodilj toa tjakinamangoa', azoa na naseman tjaparavac toa sala salasaladj mavan a nasancawcao." aico a tolo, ini ka ini ka kaolavan angata a sepaiwan zoko a cawcao.
